title: Is Stephen Miller a fan of asylum-seekers who have been thrown at violent anti-Semitics?
subtitle: The White House Senior Adviser is the grandson of a Jewish immigrant who fled poverty and massacres in the Russian Empire in the early nineteenth century.
author: Alex Kasprak
vclaim: Stephen Miller, a key immigration policy engineer in the Trump administration, is a descendants of asylum-seekers who fled anti-Jewish persecution in Eastern Europe.
